title: Boundary marker between Vandal and Goth territories
support: Described by Tardia as a 'colonetta', re-used on a staircase, and as heavily damaged.

date._: Likely erected in 500 CE, consequent upon dowry of Theoderic's sister's marriage with the Vandal king leading to transfer of region of Marsala into Vandal control.

provenanceFound._: Recorded by Gualtherus in front of the house of Antonino Gehenne, subsequently seen by Francesco Tardia (1732-1778) in use on staircase on eastern side of church of S. Matteo, but not found by Mommsen.
